description: This file defines the root layout component and related configuration for a Remix-run based web application, including link elements, meta tags, and main app component.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external stylesheet links, font preconnects, and stylesheet imports for the app.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: The main layout component that wraps page content with HTML structure, meta tags, and scripts.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main application component that renders the current Outlet (route).
